attributes.action: Introduce more for children in the cheetham hill area.
attributes.additional_details: youth clubs that hold activities such as football - dancing - dj workshops -art & craft workshops. these are just a few ideas that come to mind. I also feel that some self defence classes such as martial arts, karate, kickboxing would be beneficial for the young children. I believe that this would help with discipline and respect. Crime is becoming an issue that is involving young people due to no motivation and boredom.
attributes.background: As a mother who lives in the community and have lived here all my life, I have become aware that there is nothing to keep the younger generation motivated and active. I feel that children need some good role models and something entertaining to do.
